name: @pgtyped-pydantic/example
description: A package demonstrating how pgtyped works. Forked from pgtyped, please go visit them for the original package! I take no credit for much of this work
author: Will Diamond

scripts.test: docker-compose run build && docker-compose run test && docker-compose run test-cjs
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required. Use npm test instead'
scripts.watch: echo 'No build step required. Use npm test instead'
